string-array.name: guided_activities_details
string-array.item: {"description": \"Llévalo hasta la casilla musical\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Llévalo a descansar, comer y jugar\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Lleva a Zowi a darse un baño\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}

{"description": \"Planta las semillas en sus hoyos correspondientes\", "type": "SEEDS", "seedsImages": [[black, black, black, black], [black, black, black, black], [black, black, black, black], [black, black, black, black]], "containerImages": [black, black, black, black], "correction": [RED, GREEN, BLUE, YELLOW]}

{"description": \"Coloca en cada columna lo que debemos hacer antes y después de comer\", "type": "COLUMNS", "leftTitle": "Antes", "rightTitle": "Después", "images": [[zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer], [house, house, house, house]], "correction": [LEFT, RIGHT]}
{"description": \"Resuelve las sumas y restas y consigue todos los dientes\", "type": "OPERATIONS", "operationsType": 1, "image": "zowi_6_teeth", "operationsImages": []}
{"description": \"Lleva a Zowi a resolver las adivinanzas\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Lleva a Zowi a desayunar\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Busca las frutas\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Elabora tus recetas con: pan, huevos, tomate y arroz\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}

{"description": \"Ordena los momentos de alimentación del día\", "type": "DRAG", "dragImages": [[zowi_pointer], [green_circular_button], [paper_bin], [green_circular_button], [house]], "dragImagesNumber": 5, "correction": [BREAKFAST, LUNCHEON, LUNCH, SNACK, DINNER], "containerElements": 5, "containerImages": [], "texts": [\"Desayuno\", \"Tentempié\", \"Comida\", \"Merienda\", \"Cena\"]}

{"description": \"Completa la pirámide con los alimentos en su lugar\", "type": "FOODPYRAMID", "images": [[zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer], [green_circular_button, green_circular_button, green_circular_button, green_circular_button], [paper_bin, paper_bin, paper_bin, paper_bin], [house, house, house, house], [zowi_teeth, zowi_teeth, zowi_teeth, zowi_teeth], [zowi_5_teeth, zowi_5_teeth, zowi_5_teeth, zowi_5_teeth]], "correction": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]}
{"description": \"Llévalo hasta la casilla musical\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Lleva a Zowi con su mamá\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Ayuda a Zowi a encontrar a su hermano\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}
{"description": \"Pensar qué meter aquí\", "type": "ZOWI_EYES", "imagesNumber": [4, 2], "images": [[house, house, house, house, house, house], [zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer]]}

{"description": \"Construye el rompecabezas de la familia de Zowi\", "type": "PUZZLE", "images": [[zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth], [zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth], [zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth]]}
{"description": \"Busca y encuentra todas las parejas\", "type": "MEMORY", "images": [zowi_pointer, green_circular_button, red_circular_button, house, zowi_3_teeth, black]}
{"description": \"Llévalo a la casilla musical\", "type": "GRID", "gridSize": 1, "cells": [7, 2], "images": [zowi_pointer, house]}

{"description": \"Guía a Zowi con tu mano y llévalo a casa\", "type": "GUIDE", "images": [[house, house], [zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer], [zowi_6_teeth, zowi_6_teeth], [green_circular_button, green_circular_button]], "correction": [0, 1, 0, 0]}
{"description": \"Pensar qué meter aquí\", "type": "ZOWI_EYES", "imagesNumber": [4, 2], "images": [[house, house, house, house, house, house], [zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer]]}

{"description": \"Arrastra los muebles a su lugar de la casa\", "type": "DRAG", "dragImages": [[zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer], [house, house, house, house], [paper_bin, paper_bin, paper_bin, paper_bin]], "dragImagesNumber": 7, "correction": [LIVING_ROOM, KITCHEN, BEDROOM], "containerElements": 3, "containerImages": [], "texts": ["Salón", "Cocina", "Habitación"]}

{"description": \"Construye el rompecabezas de la casa de Zowi\", "type": "PUZZLE", "images": [[zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth], [zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth], [zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth]]}

{"description": \"Resuelve las sumas y restas con los objetos de la casa\", "type": "OPERATIONS", "operationsType": 2, "image": "zowi_teeth", "operationsImages": [house, zowi_pointer, zowi_2_teeth, red_circular_button, zowi_6_teeth, green_circular_button]}
{"description": \"Toca el instrumento siguiendo el dictado musical\", "type": "MUSIC", "images": [dictation_1, dictation_2, dictation_3, dictation_4, dictation_5]}

{"description": \"Lleva a Zowi al colegio. Elige el camino más corto\", "type": "COLOURED_GRID", "cells": [[3, 14], [2, 11], [9, 12]], "images": [house, zowi_pointer], "colouredCells": [[GREEN, GREEN, BLANK, RED, GREEN, BLANK, BLUE, RED, GREEN, BLUE, BLUE, RED, GREEN, BLANK, RED, RED], [BLUE, BLANK, GREEN, GREEN, BLUE, RED, RED, GREEN, BLUE, BLUE, BLANK, GREEN, BLANK, BLUE, BLUE, BLANK], [GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, GREEN, BLANK, BLANK, GREEN, BLANK, BLUE, BLUE, BLANK, RED, RED, RED, RED]]}
{"description": \"Pensar qué meter aquí\", "type": "ZOWI_EYES", "imagesNumber": [4, 2], "images": [[house, house, house, house, house, house], [zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer]]}

{"description": \"Resuelve las sumas y restas con los objetos del colegio\", "type": "OPERATIONS", "operationsType": 2, "image": "zowi_teeth", "operationsImages": [house, zowi_pointer, zowi_2_teeth, red_circular_button, zowi_6_teeth, green_circular_button]}

{"description": \"Construye el rompecabezas del colegio\", "type": "PUZZLE", "images": [[zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth], [zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth], [zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth, zowi_3_teeth]]}

{"description": \"Arrastra cada acción a su columna\", "type": "COLUMNS", "leftTitle": "Antes", "rightTitle": "Después", "images": [[zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer, zowi_pointer], [house, house, house, house]], "correction": [LEFT, RIGHT]}

string-array.item: {"description": \"¡Identifica la imagen correspondiente al tema!\", "type": "LOGIC_BLOCKS", "images": [triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande, triangulo_rojo_grande]}
